author: alex
msg: Moved LogHelper to Logger.Helper static inner class
Enhanced throwableToString() -- expands nested ServletExceptions,
TomcatExceptions, SQLExceptions; added "Root Cause" string parameter
(for localization)
Rearranged vars/methods -- static first, then instance
Added defaultLogger variable
Added canIgnore() method for checking if an IO/net exception is cause
for alarm
Use FastDateFormat to format timestamps (slight speed improvement)
Logger.Helper:
Added "Object owner" to constructor, reads name from Class instead
of passing in a string
Support for using as a base class for classes that don't want to
bother creating one -- just say "extends Logger.Helper" and you can
use log() methods
Added proxy property -- points to a Logger.Helper whose Logger we'll
use instead of our own

author: alex
msg: Removed in favor of Logger.Helper

author: alex
msg: Clean up logging, remove printStackTrace and System.out.println

msg: Clean up logging, remove printStackTrace and System.out.println
